amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 512 which prohibits use of funds by the DOD to construct, renovate, or expand and facility in the United States, its territories, or possessions to house any individual detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, for the purpose of detention or imprisonment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 512 from the bill pertaining to the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 187).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 254 (Roll no. 187).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Nadler.
